amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to require any executive agency to submit a constitutional authority statement with any proposed rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzales, Tony amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Gonzales, Tony.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Gonzales, Tony.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gonzales, Tony amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
